word:
The counsels given me of God for the Health Retreat have never been followed. There has been a departure from the ways of God, as you will see by the copy of letters which I send. If I had time I could copy much more of like character. I am in deep earnest that you should come where you can in all things do the will and work of God.--Letter 73, 1896. 





Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. April 13, 1989. Entire Letter.
